references.paper_title: Highly accurate protein structure prediction with AlphaFold.
references.reason: This paper introduces AlphaFold, a revolutionary deep learning model for protein structure prediction, which serves as a major benchmark for the field and inspires the use of deep learning methods in RNA structure prediction.

references.paper_title: Atomic accuracy in predicting and designing noncanonical RNA structure.
references.reason: This paper presents a benchmark dataset of RNA structures and methods for single-state RNA design that is used to evaluate the performance of the proposed gRNAde model.

references.paper_title: Robust deep learning based protein sequence design using ProteinMPNN.
references.reason: This work introduces ProteinMPNN, a successful geometric deep learning model for protein design, which provides architectural inspiration for gRNAde's design.

references.paper_title: Cryo-EM structure and functional landscape of an RNA polymerase ribozyme.
references.reason: This study provides a real-world dataset of RNA mutational fitness landscapes that are used in a retrospective analysis to demonstrate the utility of gRNAde for zero-shot ranking of RNA mutants.

references.paper_title: Geometric deep learning: grids, groups, graphs, geodesics, and gauges.
references.reason: This work provides the theoretical background for using geometric deep learning methods in the field of biomolecular structure modeling and design, which is central to the approach used in gRNAde.
